privacyPolicyDescription: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information in compliance with GDPR and other privacy regulations.
privacyPolicyIntro: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.
privacyContactInfo: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
informationCollectionContent:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you:

  • Fill out inquiry forms or contact us
  • Subscribe to our newsletter
  • Create an account on our website
  • Participate in surveys or promotions

This may include your name, email address, phone number, company information, and project details.

We also automatically collect certain information when you visit our website, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, and browsing behavior through cookies and similar technologies.
informationUseContent:
We use the information we collect to:

  • Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
  • Send you product information and marketing communications (with your consent)
  • Improve our website and services
  • Analyze usage patterns and trends
  • Comply with legal obligations
  • Protect against fraud and security threats

We process your personal data based on legitimate interests, contractual necessity, legal compliance, or your explicit consent.
informationSharingContent:
We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

  • With service providers who assist us in operating our website and business
  • When required by law or to protect our rights
  • In connection with a business transfer or merger
  • With your explicit consent

All third-party service providers are contractually bound to protect your information and use it only for specified purposes.
dataSecurityContent:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:

  • Encryption of data in transit and at rest
  • Regular security assessments and updates
  • Access controls and authentication systems
  • Employee training on data protection
  • Secure data centers and backup systems

While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
cookiesAndTrackingContent:
We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze website usage. Types of cookies we use include:

  • Necessary cookies: Essential for website functionality
  • Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site
  • Marketing cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements
  • Functional cookies: Remember your preferences and settings

You can control cookie settings through our cookie consent banner or your browser settings. Disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.
yourRightsContent:
Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:

  • Access and obtain a copy of your personal data
  • Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
  • Request deletion of your personal data
  • Restrict or object to processing
  • Data portability
  • Withdraw consent at any time

To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below. We will respond to your request within the timeframe required by applicable law.
gdprRightsIntro: If you are located in the European Union, you have the following rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
rightToAccess: Right to access your personal data and information about how it's processed
rightToRectification: Right to correct inaccurate or incomplete personal data
rightToErasure: Right to request deletion of your personal data ('right to be forgotten')
rightToRestriction: Right to restrict processing of your personal data in certain circumstances
rightToPortability: Right to receive your personal data in a portable format
rightToObject: Right to object to processing based on legitimate interests or direct marketing
cookieNotice: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our use of cookies.
cookiePreferencesDesc: We use different types of cookies to optimize your experience on our website. You can choose which categories you'd like to allow.
necessaryCookiesDesc: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable basic features like page navigation and access to secure areas.
analyticsCookiesDesc: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
marketingCookiesDesc: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement.
functionalCookiesDesc: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences and settings.
